short_description.eng: Essays written by adult learners of Swedish

description.eng:
SweLL-gold corpus is a corpus of essays written by adult learners of Swedish. It was collected during the period of 2007-2021 in the SweLL project, and contains 502 essays that have been pseudonymized, normalized and correction annotated.
